lenders.name: Rance
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed, and want to bless others.  In my travels, I have come to believe that outright aid creates dependency.  The Kiva model helps people help themselves out of poverty.  If I loan to 10 people, and 2 don't repay...so what?  I've helped 8 people RADICALLY change their life!  Keeping money in the system is incredible....when someone pays you back, re-lend it to someone else in need.  I love seeing people help themselves, while breaking the cycle of dependency.
lenders.occupational_info: Follower, husband, father, and friend who dabbles in the financial services field.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: In helping others, we help ourselves.  Microfinance is a way of engaging in sustainable philanthropy and social responsibility.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in fundraising for a university and help raise money for scholarships, faculty and building campaigns.

lenders.name: WLC Kiva Project
lenders.loan_because: The Walter L Cohen HS Kiva Project is a student based philanthropy group.  The students are required to conduct research on individual Kiva Entrepreneurs and then develop a persuasive presentation for the class.  The students then act as a committee evaluating the different presentations before choosing one to provide funding for.
lenders.occupational_info: The purpose of this project is to promote the real world application of economic and geographic knowledge as well as communication, business, and team work skills.

lenders.name: Sirpa
lenders.loan_because: This is a good way to help someone in person.

lenders.name: Kenneth
lenders.loan_because: I want to help as I have been helped
lenders.occupational_info: Having suffered the pains of PARENTAL ALIENATION SYNDROME and seeing first hand the incredible destruction is causes in the lives of all involved,, I pray for my chlidren and the children of others who have experienced and are experiencing what should be considered one of the greatest crimes against humanity, the evil act of one parent taking away the right of a child to love both their parents, sometimes the illness of the offending parent is just too great and the ALIENATION can steal away the entire childhood years from the other parent, it is my dream and goal to end PARENTAL ALIENATION SYNDROME as soon as possible for each family,, We use the Internet daily it is a very powerful medium,, we must use it for GOOD for the BETTERMENT of our kind the Human Race,,so it's with that heart,,I use the proceeds from my business to further my life's passion which is creating a forum where Parents and Children who are seperated because of PARENTAL ALIENATION SYNDROME can find one another and never be seperated again.... To spread the word of the exisitence of such a program that the whole world will use it and one day put an end to the hideous machine that is the FAMILY COURT SYSTEM, through love and support and a sense of doing what is right,, we can prevent children from ever being separated from both their parents :) or sadly we can atleast reunite adult children with their other parent before its too late and PARENTAL ALIENATION SYNDROME strikes its final blow, which is the parent and child never get back together again,, please help me get the word out, to breathe life into  FATHERS LOST AND FOUND, I have used every dime of my money and my business is now suffering as a result of PAS and my efforts to combat it,, Thank you for your time and now if nothing else you too know about the crime of PAS please pass along the website even if you can't lend  "We should teach Children how to love not who to love"  myspace.com/fatherslostandfound

At the age of 20, he is more like a boy of 16.  It requires a lot of time to work with the schools and other people to educate them on Asberger's Syndrome.  He cannot think beyond the next day.  He does not have dreams of his future.

lenders.name: SCCBank
lenders.loan_because: SCCBank has issued a novel currency that is partially backed by environmental and social goods. We are loaning a portion of our currency reserves across the globe, via Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info:
SCCBank is a San Francisco-based financial innovation start-up, focusing on complementary currency systems. 

Ken Lynch founded SCCBank with other top tier school graduates to develop a pipeline of currency, payment, and banking innovations for a quickly changing financial and political landscape.  Start-up values include financial safety, the environment, and community.

The Carbon Coin is our first prototype currency, sold as novel art pieces.  We are investigating how to grow this project within the context of the American regulatory framework, and are exploring how future Carbon Coins and other new currency innovations (including new mediums of exchange, store of value methods, etc) should be regulated.

lenders.occupational_info:
I work fulltime, but I also own a few websites that I run as a business in my spare time. These generate a bit of extra income which in turn, means I'm in a fortunate position to be able to help others.

I can't get enough of travelling & exploring, love the escapism that scuba-diving offers, play golf badly and I'm in the process of learning photography

Any menu that has Cheesecake or Flapjacks listed as a desert, in my eyes, is a winner!

lenders.name: Skelton Music
lenders.loan_because: 100% of every purchase through Skelton Music is redirected into a Kiva loan to help alleviate poverty.  This loan will be put in the hands of an entrepreneur in need.  Once the funds have been repaid, they are immediately redistributed to another person.  Thank you to everyone that has made a purchase---check out how many people we have helped so far!

lenders.name: Ethical Culture Society
lenders.loan_because: We want to help others create a better world
lenders.occupational_info:
The Ethical Culture Society of Silicon Valley is a vibrant, caring community dedicated to cultivating ethical growth and action in its members and in the larger world.

Ethical Culture is a humanistic religious, philosophical, and educational movement inspired by the ideal that the supreme aim of life is working to create a more humane society.  Our focus is on how we live our lives.  Our faith is in the capacity and responsibility of human beings to act in their personal relationships and in the larger community to help create a better world.

Members come together to assist each other in developing ethical ideas and ideals; to celebrate life's joys and support each other through life's crises; to work together to improve our world and the world of our children.
